overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This portfolio site is a static site built to showcase key projects. It is developed with Vue.js and Bootstrap, hosted on GitHub Pages, and deployed via CI/CD on GitHub Actions.

items.title: Multilingual
items.description: Supports multiple languages and allows users to switch languages.

items.title: CI/CD
items.description: Automated build and deployment with GitHub Actions.

items.title: Analytics
items.description: Usage is visualized with Google Analytics.
